title: Concrete pipes and pre-stressed products
brief_description: The manufacture of reinforced concrete products at Hume’s plant in Victoria. Welding the reinforcing for a concrete pipe and casting the pipe; preparing the reinforcing for slabs, beams and piles; pouring concrete and settling it with a mechanical vibrator; curing the concrete; transporting the finished goods to the site.
